body:
Comment 2 by **achowe**: 
I think you can still be portable if you confine yourselves to "ksh" instead of "bash".
As I said before bash is just a Linux version of ksh, which POSIX. I tried I simple
sym.link:

cd /usr/local/bin
ln -s /bin/ksh bash

then proceeded to build Go (almost). The majority of the build works now, though I
suspect the new failure is not shell related issue:
